//-- DECODE_bits.txt
//-- The Finites State Machine that controls the multiplexers in the processor
//-- depending on the opcode.

//-- Only the  four Least Significant bits of the address input are used
//-- Addresses are 4-bit opcodes.
//-- The word addressed by an opcode contains the control
//-- bits for that instruction.
//--     
//--      ============
//--      ._._._.._...
//--    8 .imm_sel[1]          
//--    7 .imm_sel[0]
//--      ._._._.._...
//--    6 ._DMEM_we
//--      ._._._.._...
//--    5 ._._Reg_we
//--      ._._._.._...
//--    4 ._._._WB_sel[1]
//--    3 ._._._.WB_sel[0]
//--      ._._._.._...
//--    2 ._._._.._ALU_ctl[2]
//--    1 ._._._.._.ALU_ctl[1]
//--    0 ._._._.._..ALU_ctl[0]
//--      ._._._.._...
//--      ._._._.._...          opcode   instruction
0000_000_00_0_0_00_000   //---  0000     ????
0000_000_00_0_1_10_000   //---  0001     ADD
0000_000_01_0_1_11_000   //---  0010     LSB
0000_000_10_0_1_11_000   //---  0011     MSB
0000_000_00_0_0_00_000   //---  0100     ????
0000_000_00_0_1_10_001   //---  0101     AND
0000_000_00_0_1_01_000   //---  0110     LDR
0000_000_00_1_0_00_000   //---  0111     STR
0000_000_00_0_0_00_000   //---  1000     ????
0000_000_00_0_1_10_010   //---  1001     NOT
0000_000_00_0_0_00_000   //---  1010     ????
0000_000_00_0_0_00_000   //---  1011     ????
0000_000_00_0_0_00_000   //---  1100     ????
0000_000_00_0_1_11_000   //---  1101     LIM
0000_000_00_0_1_00_000   //---  1110     LEA
0000_000_00_0_0_00_000   //---  1111     ????
0000_0000_0_0_0_00_000
0000_0000_0_0_0_00_000
0000_0000_0_0_0_00_000
